revised_title: Averages of Additive Quantities for the Master Equation: Applications in Thermal Equilibrium and Steady-State Conditions
tldr: The authors explore the evaluation of ensemble averages for systems with dynamics described by a master equation. They provide a general procedure to express these averages as integrals over time of appropriate time-correlation functions. The results are applicable to thermal equilibrium and steady-state situations, covering a wide range of important concepts in statistical theory.
